Class Setup.PropertiesException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
javax.naming.NamingException
javax.naming.ConfigurationException
us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.Setup.PropertiesException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Setup.PropertyFileNotFoundException, Setup.PropertyFormatException, Setup.PropertyNotFoundException
Enclosing class:
Setup
public static class Setup.PropertiesException extends ConfigurationException
Represents an exception that occurs during the processing of properties. This exception serves as a general exception for property-related issues and provides a base class for more specific property-related exceptions.
